column11: articlename=A Brief History of Interactive Fiction, Page 3

column2: }}'''LORD''' is a text-adventure which covers ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', as well as utilising information from other sources.<ref name="Tolkien Games">{{webcite
column8: accessed=29 december 2014}}</ref> It has 550 separate locations,<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> and was the first text-adventure based on a book.<ref name="Brasslantern"/> The game was written and designed by Olli J. Paavola, at the time a student at the [[wikipedia:Aalto University School of Science and Technology
column9: Helsinki University of Technology]].<ref name="Brasslantern"/><ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
